metadata.title: CVE-2021-47287 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: drivercore: auxiliary bus: Fix memory leak when driver_register() fail Ifdriver_register() returns with error we need to free the memory allocatedfor auxdrv->driver.name before returning from __auxiliary_driver_register()

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
